content:
Here are shorter bullet points for each food item you listed:

1. Battered Cod Fillets 170-200g:
* Fish fillets coated in a batter and fried
* Cod is a good source of protein and low in fat
* Fillets are convenient and easy to prepare
* Can be served with chips, vegetables, or salad
1. Battered Cod Fillets 230-290g:
* Fish fillets coated in a batter and fried
* Cod is a good source of protein and low in fat
* Fillets are convenient and easy to prepare
* Can be served with chips, vegetables, or salad
1. Bramley Apple & Blackberry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Combination of apples and blackberries in a sweet pie filling
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Blackberries are a good source of fiber and vitamin K
1. Bramley Apple & Blackcurrant Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Combination of apples and blackcurrants in a sweet pie filling
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Blackcurrants are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
1. Raspberry & Bramley Apple Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Combination of apples and raspberries in a sweet pie filling
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Raspberries are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
1. Bramley Apple Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with apples
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Apples are a good source of fiber and vitamin C
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
1. Black Cherry Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with black cherries
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Black cherries are a good source of antioxidants and fiber
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
1. Blackcurrant Pie Filling and Fruit Topping:
* Sweet pie filling made with blackcurrants
* Can be used as a pie filling or as a topping for desserts like ice cream
* Blackcurrants are a good source of vitamin C and antioxidants
* Can be combined with other fruit toppings for a variety of flavors
